page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Around the area that we have to cover there are 17 farms. The highest acreage is 900 acres. The most popular crops are wheat and barley. The most popular animals are pigs. Farms are now officially measured in hectares but every farmer we contacted used "acres". LIST OF FARMERS, STOCK, & CROPS 1.Kemp, 130 acres, pigs, chickens, wheat, barley, hay. 2.Lay, 230 acres, pigs, wheat, barley. 3.Pursehouse, 4 acres, 1200 pigs. 4.Woodward, 160 acres, barley, wheat, beans. 5.Miller, 800 acres, pigs, mare & foal, wheat, barley, hay, sugar beet, rape 6.Wallis, 110 acres, cows,wheat,barley. 7.Last, 100 acres, 400 pigs, wheat. 8.Gooderham, 90 acres, cows, wheat,
